targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  count(*) AS total_detections
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
  AND common_name IN ($specie)
  AND common_name NOT IN(${exclude:sqlstring})
  AND confidence >= $confidence

SELECT 
  avg(confidence) AS avg_confidence
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
  AND common_name IN ($specie)
  AND common_name NOT IN(${exclude:sqlstring})
  AND confidence >= $confidence

SELECT
  count(DISTINCT common_name) AS unique_species
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
  AND common_name IN ($specie)
  AND common_name NOT IN(${exclude:sqlstring})
  AND confidence >= $confidence

SELECT
  AVG(end_seconds - start_seconds) AS avg_audio_length_seconds
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
  AND common_name IN ($specie)

SELECT
  extract(
    epoch
    FROM $__timeTo()::timestamp
      - $__timeFrom()::timestamp
  ) 
  / 3600.0
  AS window_hours;

SELECT
  count(*) * 3600.0
    / extract(
        epoch
        FROM $__timeTo()::timestamp
          - $__timeFrom()::timestamp
      )
  AS avg_per_hour
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time);

SELECT
  date_trunc('day', time)                        AS "time",
  count(*)                                        AS total_obs,
  count(DISTINCT scientific_name)                  AS species_count
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1;

SELECT
  extract(hour from time) AS detection_hour,
  COUNT(*) AS " "
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
  AND common_name IN ($specie)
  AND common_name NOT IN(${exclude:sqlstring})
  AND confidence >= $confidence 
GROUP BY detection_hour
ORDER BY detection_hour;

SELECT
  common_name,
  COUNT(*) AS total_by_species
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
  AND common_name IN ($specie)
  AND common_name NOT IN (${exclude:sqlstring})
  AND confidence >= $confidence 
GROUP BY common_name
ORDER BY total_by_species DESC;

WITH bucketed AS (
  SELECT
    width_bucket(confidence, 0.0, 1.0, 25) AS bucket,
    count(*)                         AS detections
  FROM sensor_data
  WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
  GROUP BY bucket
)
SELECT
  -- format the lower edge of each bucket as text for the X-axis
  ((bucket - 1) * (1.0/25))::numeric(4,2)::text AS confidence_bucket,
  detections
FROM bucketed
ORDER BY confidence_bucket;

SELECT
  date_trunc('day', time)     AS date,
  common_name                 AS species,
  COUNT(*)                    AS cnt
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
  AND confidence >= $confidence
  AND common_name IN ($specie)
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1,2;

SELECT
  time,
  start_seconds,
  end_seconds,
  scientific_name,
  common_name,
  confidence,
  sensor_id
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
  AND common_name IN ($specie)
  AND common_name NOT IN(${exclude:sqlstring})
  AND confidence >= $confidence

SELECT 
  count(*) AS total_detections
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
  AND common_name IN ($specie)
  AND common_name NOT IN(${exclude:sqlstring})
  AND confidence >= $confidence

SELECT
  count(DISTINCT common_name) AS unique_species
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
  AND common_name IN ($specie)
  AND common_name NOT IN(${exclude:sqlstring})
  AND confidence >= $confidence

SELECT 
  avg(confidence) AS avg_confidence
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
  AND common_name IN ($specie)
  AND common_name NOT IN(${exclude:sqlstring})
  AND confidence >= $confidence

SELECT
  AVG(end_seconds - start_seconds) AS avg_audio_length_seconds
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
  AND common_name IN ($specie)

SELECT
  count(*) * 3600.0
    / extract(
        epoch
        FROM $__timeTo()::timestamp
          - $__timeFrom()::timestamp
      )
  AS avg_per_hour
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time);

SELECT
  extract(
    epoch
    FROM $__timeTo()::timestamp
      - $__timeFrom()::timestamp
  ) 
  / 3600.0
  AS window_hours;

SELECT
  date_trunc('day', time)                        AS "time",
  count(*)                                        AS total_obs,
  count(DISTINCT scientific_name)                  AS species_count
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1;

SELECT
  extract(hour from time) AS detection_hour,
  COUNT(*) AS " "
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
  AND common_name IN ($specie)
  AND common_name NOT IN(${exclude:sqlstring})
  AND confidence >= $confidence 
GROUP BY detection_hour
ORDER BY detection_hour;

SELECT
  common_name,
  COUNT(*) AS total_by_species
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
  AND common_name IN ($specie)
  AND common_name NOT IN (${exclude:sqlstring})
  AND confidence >= $confidence 
GROUP BY common_name
ORDER BY total_by_species DESC;

SELECT
  time AS timestamp,
  confidence
FROM
  sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
ORDER BY
  timestamp ASC;

SELECT
  date_trunc('day', time)     AS date,
  common_name                 AS species,
  COUNT(*)                    AS cnt
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
  AND confidence >= $confidence
  AND common_name IN ($specie)
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1,2;

SELECT
  time,
  start_seconds,
  end_seconds,
  scientific_name,
  common_name,
  confidence,
  sensor_id
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
  AND common_name IN ($specie)
  AND common_name NOT IN(${exclude:sqlstring})
  AND confidence >= $confidence

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  confidence,
  scientific_name
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
  AND common_name IN ($specie)
  AND common_name NOT IN(${exclude:sqlstring})
  AND confidence >= $confidence 
ORDER BY time ASC

SELECT 
  count(*) AS total_detections
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)

SELECT
  count(DISTINCT common_name) AS unique_species
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)

SELECT
  AVG(end_seconds - start_seconds) AS avg_audio_length_seconds
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter("time");

SELECT 
  avg(confidence) AS avg_confidence
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)

SELECT
  extract(hour from time) AS detection_hour,
  COUNT(*) AS detections
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY detection_hour
ORDER BY detection_hour;

SELECT 
  time_bucket('1 day', time) as day,
  count(*) as total_detections
FROM sensor_data 
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY day
ORDER BY day

SELECT
  time AS "Detection Time",
  -- scientific_name AS "Sci Name",
  common_name AS "Common Name",
  confidence AS "Confidence"
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
ORDER BY time DESC
LIMIT 10;

SELECT
  common_name,
  COUNT(*) AS total_by_species
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(sensor_data.time)
GROUP BY common_name
ORDER BY total_by_species DESC;

SELECT 
  time_bucket('1 day', sensor_data.time) AS "time",
  common_name AS species, 
  AVG(confidence) AS avg
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(sensor_data.time)
GROUP BY 1, species
ORDER BY 1 ASC, species ASC

SELECT
  time,
  start_seconds,
  end_seconds,
  scientific_name,
  common_name,
  confidence,
  sensor_id
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)

SELECT
  time AS "Detection Time",
  -- scientific_name AS "Sci Name",
  common_name AS "Common Name",
  confidence AS "Confidence"
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
  AND common_name IN ($specie)
  AND common_name NOT IN(${exclude:sqlstring})
  AND confidence >= $confidence 
ORDER BY time DESC
LIMIT 10;

SELECT
  date_trunc('day', time)     AS date,
  common_name                 AS species,
  COUNT(*)                    AS cnt
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
  AND confidence >= $confidence
  AND common_name IN ($specie)
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1,2;

SELECT
  date_trunc('day', time)     AS date,
  common_name                 AS species,
  COUNT(*)                    AS cnt
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
  AND confidence >= $confidence
  AND common_name IN ($specie)
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1,2;

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  confidence,
  scientific_name
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
ORDER BY time ASC

SELECT
  time_bucket('1h', time) AS bucket,
  percentile_cont(0.25) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY confidence) AS q1,
  percentile_cont(0.50) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY confidence) AS median,
  percentile_cont(0.75) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY confidence) AS q3
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY bucket
ORDER BY bucket;
